category1.name: Titanic Might
category1.description: Melee Weapon. Attacks made with this enchanted weapon gain +3 Strength and Magical Attacks.

category1.name: Blessed Inscriptions
category1.description: Melee Weapon. Attacks made with this enchanted weapon gain Divine Attacks and failed to-wound rolls must be rerolled.

category1.name: King Slayer
category1.description: Melee Weapon. The wielder of the enchanted weapon gains +X Strength, +X Armour Penetration, +X Attack Value and Magical Attacks when attacking with it, where X is equal to the number of enemy Characters in base contact with the wielder's unit. This bonus is calculated and effective at the Initiative Step when such attacks are made.

category1.name: Shield Breaker
category1.description: Melee Weapon. Attacks made with this enchanted weapon gain +6 Armour Penetration, Magical Attacks ,and can never wound on to-wound rolls better than 3+.

category1.name: Hero's Heart
category1.description: Hand Weapon and Paired Weapon. The wielder of this enchanted weapon gains +1 Attack Value when using it. Attacks made with this enchanted weapon gain Magical Attacks and always have at least Strength 5 and at least Armour Penetration 3.

category1.name: Touch of Greatness
category1.description: Melee Weapon. Attacks made with this enchanted weapon gain +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration and Magical Attacks. Strength modifiers from this weapon (combining both mundane and Weapon Enchantment modifiers) cannot exceed +2 (but can exceed +2 through modifiers from other sources, such as spells).

category1.name: Supernatural Dexterity
category1.description: Melee Weapon. The wielder of this enchanted weapon gains +2 Offensive Skill and +2 Agility while using it, and attacks made with it gain Magical Attacks.

category1.name: Cleansing Light
category1.description: Melee Weapon. At the start of each Round of Combat, the wielder may choose to give attacks made with this enchanted weapon Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

category1.name: Burning Portent
category1.description: Hand Weapon. Attacks made with this Weapon have their Armour Penetration set to 10 and gain Magical Attacks, Flaming Attacks and Multiple Wounds (D3).

category1.name: Symbol of Slaughter
category1.description: Hand Weapon and Paired Weapons. When using this weapon, the wielder gains +2 Attack Value and +2 Agility and suffers -2 Offensive Skill and -2 Defensive Skill. Attacks made with this Weapon have gain Magical Attacks.

weapons.name: Burning Portent
weapons.description: Hand Weapon enchantment. Attacks made with this weapon have their Armour Penetration set to 10 and gain Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, and Multiple Wounds (D3).

weapons.name: Symbol of Slaughter
weapons.description: Hand Weapon and Paired Weapons enchantment. When using this weapon, the wielder gains +2 Attack Value, +2 Agility, and suffers -2 Offensive Skill. Attacks made with this weapon gain Magical Attacks.

armours.name: Thrice-Forged
armours.description: Standard Size models only. Suit of Armour enchantment. The wearer gains +3 Armour.

armours.name: Gladiator’s Spirit
armours.description: Spiked Shield enchantment. Hits caused by the Spiked Shield gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

standards.name: Icon of the Infinite
standards.description: 0-2 per Army. The bearer can cast Hellfire (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

standards.name: Banner of the Void
standards.description: Chosen, Chosen Knights, and Chosen Lords only. The bearer’s unit gains Aegis (5+, against Ranged Attacks).

standards.name: Wasteland Torch
standards.description: The bearer’s unit gains Strider (Ruins). After determining Deployment Zones (at the end of step 6 of the Pre-Game Sequence), you may choose a single Building, Field, or Forest Terrain Feature. Chosen Fields and Forests become Ruins, and chosen Buildings become Cliffs.

artefacts.name: Ledger of Souls
artefacts.description: Dominant. The bearer gains The Reckoning (see Battleshrine).

artefacts.name: Immortal Gauntlets
artefacts.description: At the start of any Round of Combat you may discard a Veil Token from your Veil Token pool. If so, choose either Divine Attacks, Flaming Attacks, or Magical Attacks. The bearer’s Close Combat Attacks gain the chosen Attack Attribute. The chosen effect lasts until the end of the phase.

artefacts.name: Orb of Foreboding
artefacts.description: At the start of the Deployment Phase, immediately before step 1 (Determine who deploys first), you may choose one of the opponent’s non-Character units. This unit loses Vanguard and Scout. The opponent must immediately deploy this unit. This is done outside the normal Deployment procedure and is ignored when determining the first deployed unit and the number of deployed units.

artefacts.name: Lord of the Damned
artefacts.description: Sorcerers only. Any unit with Irredeemable within 18″ of the bearer may reroll the distance it moves in the Movement Phase with Random Movement.

artefacts.name: Wyrd Stone
artefacts.description: One use only. Must be activated when the bearer’s model is hit by an attack with at least Strength 5 or at least Armour Penetration 5. The bearer’s model gains Aegis (4+). If the bearer’s model is Standard or Large, this effect is lost at end of the Player Turn. If the bearer’s model is Gigantic, this effect is lost after rolling the Aegis Save once (if the bearer is hit by several simultaneous attacks, the owner chooses which attack to use the Aegis Save against).

specialrules.specialrule: Breath Attack  (Str 4 , AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Dying Embers)
